name: Fungus Among Us
description:
We strongly recommend you to use  Firefox  to play the Web Player version. (https://www.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/new/)

Once upon a time, a mushroom hunter was trapped by his preys…

Controls

  • WASD or Arrows: move
  • Left click: hit
  • Right click or space: dash

The character will hit in the direction of your mouse cursor.

Your goal

You shall survive while getting as much spore as you can by defeating mushrooms, and use it to buy all the upgrades from the shop, all of that without dying!

Enjoy!
